org.eclipse.ecf.discovery.ui
Class UrlServiceAccessHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.ecf.discovery.ui.UrlServiceAccessHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IServiceAccessHandler
public class UrlServiceAccessHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServiceAccessHandler

This is a service access handler for handling the http/http service. The associated properties for this service are documented at http://www.dns-sd.org/ServiceTypes.html.

Method Detail

getContributionsForService

public org.eclipse.jface.action.IContributionItem[] getContributionsForService(IServiceInfo serviceInfo)
Description copied from interface: IServiceAccessHandler
Get the menu items to contribute for the given IServiceInfo. Implementers should return a non-null array of IContributionItem instances (menus or menu items). These will be added to the context menu of the service entry identified by the given service info.

Specified by:
getContributionsForService in interface IServiceAccessHandler
Parameters:
serviceInfo - the IServiceInfo for the contributions. Will not be null.
Returns:
IContributionItem [] any contribution to the context menu for the given service info. If null, then no items will be added to the context menu.
